IncidentDef.label: stars are wrong
IncidentDef.letterText: Unbound to the proper order of the cosmos, the stars themselves seem to sting our eyes with a hateful scorn.

MapConditionDef.label: stars are wrong
MapConditionDef.description: Unbound to the proper order of the cosmos, the stars themselves seem to sting our eyes with a hateful scorn. Sacrifices are discouraged during this period.
MapConditionDef.endMessage: The stars as we know them have returned

IncidentDef.label: stars are right
IncidentDef.letterText: The planets of the system have aligned. Otherworldly bodies seem to call to your colonists.

MapConditionDef.label: stars are right
MapConditionDef.description: The planets of the system have auspiciously aligned. Plants and animals will flourish and cult sacrifices will receive bonuses.
MapConditionDef.endMessage: Celestial bodies are no longer in alignment.

IncidentDef.label: Tree of Nightmares
IncidentDef.letterText: It gazes through the souls of all that pass it.
